LOL. Nice post, Alloran.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Ramjet/Falcon/Snare:::
> 
> ::They leave the battle and open their comm links to Ramjet::
> Falcon: Hey Ramjet, we're leaving the planet.
> Ramjet: Huh? Why?
> Snare: We're tired of the war.  I want this to be as friendly as 
possible. 
> Destrons all the way!
> Ramjet: But-
> ::Ramjet's comm was cut off.  In a few hours, Falcon and Snare had 
> constrcuted a crude ship::
> Falcon: Let's get outta here!
> ::They blast off, flying out into space.  A few months later, we 
find them 
> walking in a desert region of a distnat planet::
> Snare: I can't beleive this Falcon, first Mary dumps us, then the 
cops take 
> our nest egg, then the hock breaks down!
> Falcon: Yeah, when are we gonna catch a break?
> ::At that moment a bus pulls up next to them.  The door opens and 
about 20 
> femmes come out::
> Femme: Aloha!  We're on the national bikini tour and we need two 
oilboys to 
> grease us up before each compititon!
> ::Falcon and Snare look at each other for a second::
> Snare: You are in luck!  There's a town back that way, im sure 
you'll find 
> two guys there!
> Femme: Uhh, okay.
> ::The bus pulls away.  Falcon snaps his head back at Snare and 
grabs his 
> head::
> Falcon: Do you realize what you've DONE?!
> ::He runs after the bus::
> Falcon: WAIT!
> ::The bus stops and the door opens again::
> Falcon: you'll have to excuse my friend, hes a little slow. The 
town's back 
> that way!
> ::The femmes look at each other stangely, close the door, and drive 
off::
> Falcon: Wow, two lucky guys are gonna be riding around with those 
girls for 
> months!
> Snare: Yeah, but we'll catch our break too.  We just gotta keep our 
eyes 
> open...
> ::They walk off into the sunset::
